page.title: 04Royal Air Force Wyton
page.content: In this area of North St Ives there is RAF WYTON which is a main feature of our 'D'block.It is quieter at RAF WYTON as the runway is being resurfaced.That means no planes on the rampage.There are three main roles at RAF WYTON.One is PHOTO RECONNAISSA -NCE which is done by the CANBERRA. Probably the most important thing is TRANSPORT which is carried out by the HERCULES.Then finally SPY PLANES which are NIMRODS.They see what the other countries are doing and track down foreign submarines with their sonar. This week,as I write this,the Nimrod is searching underwater for little bits of a Jumbo Jet.The BOEING 747 cr- ashed about 30 miles from destination. The plane was going to Heathrow to get more fuel,and it's feared everyone on board is "DEAD".nearly all of them were from DELHI,INDIA.
